transcript.text: welcome back my friends this is destiny
Mouse and there's so many things going
on today but this one is key to
understand so clapper is basically
turning on Obama and saying it was his
fault and I'll let you see it in his own
words he did this on CNN live isn't that
interesting I think it was a fear move I
think he sees which way the wind is
blowing and this is what happened so
let's dive right in as you know the
president now has sitting members of
this government you have the Attorney
General traveling the world now meeting
with US intelligence partners trying to
find out in his view whether they
participated in some sort of Obama
administration led effort to undermine
president Trump in the last election
here you also know that John Durham who
is a former prosecutor senior Justice
Department official he's pursuing his
own investigation on the origins of that
probe are you concerned that bars or
Durham's investigation will find
wrongdoing and sink to seek to punish
former intelligence officials well I
don't I don't know I I don't I don't
think there was any wrongdoing I think
at the time all of us were trying to
navigate a very very difficult
politically fraught highly charged
situation I know for my part my main
concern was with the Russians and the
threat posed by the Russians to our our
very political fabric and the message
I'm getting from all this is apparently
what we were supposed to have done was
to ignore the Russian interference
ignore the Russian meddling and the
threat that it poses to us and oh by the
way blowing off what the then commander
chief the President Obama told us to do
which was to assemble all the reporting
that we could that we had available to
us and put it in one report that the
president could pass on to the Congress
and to the next administration and while
we're at it
declassify as much as we possibly could
to make it public and that's what we did
what well well there you have it so I
just wanted to share that with you guys
and see you guys on the next one Wow
